# now

**Type Property**

The current date and time, as of the time of access.

## Declaration

```swift
class var now: Date { get }
```

## Discussion

This is equivalent to initializing a new instance with `NSDate()` (or `[[NSDate alloc] init]` in Objective-C). The [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSDate] instance doesn’t automatically update its time after you retrieve it.
